channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2019 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.3D for .NET 19.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.3D for .NET 19.12. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category THREEDNET-590 Part of the scene lost when converting a rvm file to glb file Bug THREEDNET-597 Problem loading file Bug THREEDNET-595 Shadow created when a scene is merged Bug Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes This version has two major API changes:

item.title: Aspose.3D for .NET 19.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.3D for .NET 19.11. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category THREEDNET-575 Add .ATT file import support. New feature THREEDNET-578 Add .ATT file export support New feature THREEDNET-577 Refactor the property system in Aspose.3D Enhancement THREEDNET-583 Implemented the unsupported RVM entity type Enhancement THREEDNET-580 FBX Import Exceptions Enhancement THREEDNET-579 Problem with RVM to GLTF conversion Bug THREEDNET-582 Problem with RVM conversion Bug THREEDNET-585 Fixed the validation errors of the generated glTF files Bug API changes Added class Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.3D for .NET 19.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.3D for .NET 19.10. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category THREEDNET-567 Problem converting RVM & ATT tile Enhancement THREEDNET-570 Calculation of bounding box of primitive shapes are incorrect Enhancement THREEDNET-571 Export primitive shapes to RVM file. Enhancement THREEDNET-572 Improve primitive export support in FBX.

item.title: Aspose.3D for .NET 19.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.3D for .NET 19.9 Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category THREEDNET-532 Export 3D scene to HTML New Feature THREEDNET-561 Expose geometric transformation properties Enhancement THREEDNET-556 Geometric rotation seems incorrect Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes See the list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.3D for .NET 19.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.3D for .NET 19.8 Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category THREEDNET-528 Add point cloud support in Wavefront OBJ New Feature THREEDNET-531 Security review of Aspose.3D Enhancement THREEDNET-536 DRC to STL conversion failure Bug THREEDNET-537 Problem converting PLY to GLB Bug THREEDNET-539 The large point cloud may generate incorrect data Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes See the list of any changes made to the public API such as added, renamed, removed or deprecated members as well as any non-backward compatible change made to Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.3D for .NET 19.6 Release Notes
